BrightBlade, Rage

* Rage waited for Scourge to lead the way, she wasn't about to go into that 
huge metal object alone.*

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

* BrightBlade looked around the land as she took the lead, subbenly her 
sences came alive! There was somebot approaching! She looked back at Gangon 
and growled as she motioned towards the south/west.*

" Hay! There's somebot coming! Transform."

* BrightBlade looked off towards the south/west and saw a shape walking 
towards them, she transformed into robot mode and took out her weapon.
As her and Gangon stood on a rise she aimed her gun at the approaching bot, 
it's signature telling her that it was a Maximal.*

" Hay! You! Stop where you are or you'll be blown to scrap! Don't you have 
any clue that you're trespassing on Lord Hell Beast's land?! He wants none 
of your kind around here and frankly neither do I!"

* She began to make her way down towards the new bot and glared at her when 
she came close enough to shot at point blank range. BrightBlade looked at 
the Maximal (Plintissa) and growled, she scanned to see if Gangon was 
following her.*

" Drop what ever weapons you have and state why you're here before I get 
impatient and blow your slagin head of. Not one known for patients...or 
Maximals for that matter."

* BrightBlade brought her gun up to a height that if Plintissa decided to 
act funny she would be able to just as she claimed she would. She called 
over her shoulder to Gangon.*

" Get your butt down here, we got ourselves a Maximals straggler!"

* With that said she turned her attention back to Plintissa.*
